overlayImg.title: About Rashm Publishing House
overlayImg.text: Dar Rashm for Publishing and Distribution is a leading Saudi publishing house established in 2019 in the city of Arar, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

aims.title: Rashm aims to
aims.aim1: Enriching the Arab library with purposeful and diverse publications in various fields, with a focus on Arabic literature. All kinds of books scientific and intellectual books, children’s books, and human development books.
aims.aim2: Discovering new literary talents and supporting them by publishing their first works and offering them publishing opportunities.
aims.aim3: Contributing to spreading Arab culture by participating in Arab and international book fairs, and organizing cultural and literary events.
